/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/harness_exe.dir/harness.cu.o CMakeFiles/harness_exe.dir/kernels/simple_kernel.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/harness_exe.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
